"What do you want to know?":
"The \"ARKS League\"
is an event where participants placed into leagues
have to compete against one another.
The ranking will be updated after
they achieve a specific \"Objective\".

At the end of the period, your final rank and rewards
will be based on your event results.

The rewards can be received from \"ARKS League Mimi\"."

"■About the league placement
・Players having a similar game progress will be placed
in the same league.
・The participants will compete in that league's ranking.

■About the objective
・\"Defeat specific enemies\", \"Time attack clear times\",
\"Collect specific items\" ... will be event objectives.

■Rewards
・Are based on your rank at the end of the period.
・Can be received from \"Mimi\" at the Gate Area.
※You can receive rewards from the last 10 ARKS leagues"
